space.network.message

Class DropPickupMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • space.network.message.DropPickupMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Message

    public class DropPickupMessage
extends java.lang.Object
implements Message
    DropPickupMessage is the message used to inform clients/servers that a player has dropped an entity from their inventory.
    Author:
    James Greenwood-Thessman (300289004)
